isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9200, 9300, 9400 Models Built After January 1, 1995 - ELECTRICAL TROUBLESHOOTING SLEEPER LIGHTING AND ACCESSORIES - DESCRIPTION - Bunk Fluorescent and Reading Lights W/48, 60 Inch Flat Roof Sleeper

svcproc.title: Bunk Fluorescent and Reading Lights W/48, 60 Inch Flat Roof Sleeper
svcproc.para: The Bunk Fluorescent Light is a fluorescent light assembly designed to provide the main source of illumination in the sleeper. An additional switch is located lower in the bunk where it is accessible. The Reading Light is located in the sleeper bunk to provide illumination for reading when the fluorescent lamp is turned OFF, or when additional light is needed.
